definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒體設施不應當成爲軍事行動的目標。

sentences.english: Moving the metal is like 'a big military operation, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，運送黃金就像一場大規模的軍事行動。

sentences.english: Science construction border defense emergency military action organization command structure.
sentences.chinese: 科學構建邊防應急軍事行動組織指揮體系。

sentences.english: All military operations will require the assent of Iraqis.
sentences.chinese: 所有軍事行動都將需要伊拉克人的同意。

sentences.english: This House believes that China should take military actions against Somalia pirates.
sentences.chinese: 本院認爲中國應對索馬里海盜採取軍事行動。

sentences.english: The bad weather has hindered military action.
sentences.chinese: 壞天氣妨礙了軍事行動。

sentences.english: Rice said Moscow must abide by its stated promise to halt military operations.
sentences.chinese: 賴斯說，莫斯科必須遵守其停止軍事行動的承諾。

sentences.english: But those military operations really do now need to stop.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯的軍事行動現在的確必須停止。

sentences.english: The military action request gets there first, rapid reaction.
sentences.chinese: 軍事行動要求兵貴神速，快速反應。

sentences.english: Non-war military operation of medical service must have a legal guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 非戰爭軍事行動衛勤必須有法制保障。

sentences.english: Anzac Day -- Australia and New Zealand Army Corps.
sentences.chinese: 紀念一戰中澳洲的第一次重大軍事行動的節日。

sentences.english: An operation like this contributes to that goal.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的軍事行動就是爲了達到這個目的。

sentences.english: Retreat under fire is the most difficult and perilous of all military operations.
sentences.chinese: 敵火下撤退是一切軍事行動中最困難和危險的。

sentences.english: He said it is also the spring of the Iraqi militarys successful operations.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這也是伊拉克軍事行動獲得成功的春天。

sentences.english: The services cover shipboard and shore-based operations.
sentences.chinese: 服務將覆蓋船上和岸基的軍事行動。

sentences.english: But he said military operations in Libya were moving towards stalemate.
sentences.chinese: 但是他表示，利比亞的軍事行動即將陷入僵局。

definition: Saudi Arabia (Tw), abbr. for 沙烏地阿拉伯王國|沙乌地阿拉伯王国
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
